statements: SELECT * FROM Leadership_Development_Plans
SELECT plan_id, employee_name, objective FROM Leadership_Development_Plans WHERE progress > 50
SELECT * FROM Leadership_Development_Plans WHERE goal LIKE '%improvement%'
SELECT employee_name, goal, progress FROM Leadership_Development_Plans ORDER BY progress DESC
SELECT plan_id, employee_name, goal, objective, progress FROM Leadership_Development_Plans WHERE employee_name='Alice'
SELECT * FROM Leadership_Development_Plans WHERE progress > 50 ORDER BY employee_name DESC
SELECT plan_id, employee_name, objective FROM Leadership_Development_Plans WHERE goal = 'Professional Growth' ORDER BY progress DESC
SELECT employee_name, goal FROM Leadership_Development_Plans WHERE progress <= 25 AND objective LIKE '%improve%'
SELECT employee_name, goal, objective FROM Leadership_Development_Plans WHERE objective <> 'Enhance Communication'
SELECT DISTINCT employee_name, goal FROM Leadership_Development_Plans
SELECT * FROM Leadership_Development_Plans;
SELECT plan_name, start_date, end_date FROM Leadership_Development_Plans;
SELECT goal, progress_status FROM Progress_Tracking;
SELECT plan_id, plan_name, start_date, end_date FROM Leadership_Development_Plans WHERE plan_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Progress_Tracking WHERE plan_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM Leadership_Development_Plans WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT plan_name, end_date FROM Leadership_Development_Plans ORDER BY end_date DESC;

SELECT plan_name, COUNT(progress_id) AS progress_count FROM Leadership_Development_Plans LEFT JOIN Progress_Tracking ON Leadership_Development_Plans.plan_id = Progress_Tracking.plan_id GROUP BY plan_name;
SELECT plan_name, goal, progress_status FROM Leadership_Development_Plans JOIN Progress_Tracking ON Leadership_Development_Plans.plan_id = Progress_Tracking.plan_id WHERE progress_status = 'ongoing';
SELECT plan_name, DATEDIFF(end_date, start_date) AS duration_days FROM Leadership_Development_Plans ORDER BY duration_days DESC;
SELECT * FROM LeadershipDevelopmentPlans;
SELECT plan_name, start_date, end_date FROM LeadershipDevelopmentPlans;
SELECT objective_description, objective_status FROM Objectives;
SELECT goal_description, goal_status FROM Goals;
SELECT plan_name, start_date, end_date, status FROM LeadershipDevelopmentPlans;
SELECT * FROM LeadershipDevelopmentPlans
SELECT plan_name, start_date, end_date FROM LeadershipDevelopmentPlans WHERE status = 'Active'
SELECT plan_id, plan_name, MAX(start_date) AS latest_start_date FROM LeadershipDevelopmentPlans GROUP BY plan_id, plan_name
SELECT DISTINCT goal_status FROM Goals

SELECT plan_name, goal_description, objective_description FROM LeadershipDevelopmentPlans JOIN Goals ON LeadershipDevelopmentPlans.plan_id = Goals.plan_id JOIN Objectives ON Goals.goal_id = Objectives.goal_id
SELECT * FROM leadership_development_plans;
SELECT plan_name, start_date, end_date FROM leadership_development_plans WHERE id = 1;
SELECT user_name, email FROM users ORDER BY user_name ASC;
SELECT goal_name, progress_percentage FROM progress_tracking WHERE progress_percentage > 50;
SELECT objective_description FROM objectives WHERE goal_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM leadership_development_plans;
SELECT plan_name, start_date, end_date FROM leadership_development_plans WHERE id = 1;

SELECT users.user_name, leadership_development_plans.plan_name, progress_tracking.goal_name FROM users JOIN progress_tracking ON users.id = progress_tracking.id JOIN leadership_development_plans ON leadership_development_plans.id = progress_tracking.plan_id WHERE users.id = 1;

SELECT leadership_development_plans.plan_name, progress_tracking.goal_name, objectives.objective_description FROM leadership_development_plans JOIN progress_tracking ON leadership_development_plans.id = progress_tracking.plan_id JOIN objectives ON objectives.goal_id = progress_tracking.id;
SELECT users.user_name, users.email, progress_tracking.progress_percentage FROM users LEFT JOIN progress_tracking ON users.id = progress_tracking.id WHERE progress_tracking.progress_percentage > 50;
SELECT * FROM Leadership_Development_Plans;
SELECT plan_title, start_date, end_date FROM Leadership_Development_Plans;
SELECT employee_name, department_name FROM Employee_Details JOIN Department ON Employee_Details.department_id = Department.department_id;
SELECT goal_description, completion_status FROM Goal_Objectives WHERE completion_status = true;
SELECT plan_title, employee_name, progress_description FROM Leadership_Development_Plans JOIN Employee_Progress ON Leadership_Development_Plans.employee_id = Employee_Progress.employee_id;
SELECT * FROM Employee_Details WHERE department_id = 2 ORDER BY employee_name DESC;
SELECT employee_name, position FROM Employee_Details WHERE department_id = 1 AND position = 'Manager';
SELECT plan_title, start_date, end_date FROM Leadership_Development_Plans ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT employee_name, department_name FROM Employee_Details JOIN Department ON Employee_Details.department_id = Department.department_id WHERE manager_id = 5;
SELECT Goal_Objectives.goal_description, Employee_Details.employee_name FROM Goal_Objectives JOIN Employee_Details ON Goal_Objectives.plan_id = Employee_Details.employee_id;
